Products

At Quizworks we specialize in making quizzes, assessments and exams. Check out the details below.

Online quizzes

We are pretty awesome at creating quizzes. Or actually we enable you to be pretty awesome in making quizzes. Our basic quiz creator tool is free to use. We try to make a living by creating tailor-made customized quizzes, so if you have a quiz idea and our basic quiz creator tool not completely fits your needs? Contact us and we'll see what we can do for you.

Read more about our online quiz maker.

Do you have a very specific quizzing need? Do you want a complete customized quiz? You're at the right place! Here at Quizworks we create a lot of unique custom quizzes for our clients, we have the experience to provide you with a custom quiz very cost-efficiently.

Online Assessment Tool

We also have an online assessment tool. It's a sophisticated tool that makes it easy for you you to create an assessment. It can handle all types of assessments and feedback mechanisms. We currently offer a free version of it.
